content:encoded:
Case Closed begins this week’s show with The Kurt Bower Murder Case, from Broadway Is My Beat. That story originally aired October 20, 1951.

(30:05) Our second story comes from Mystery Is My Hobby. We’ll hear Death Is A Twin, from September 12, 1947.

Download CaseClosed739

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’d like to help out, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
